function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through collaborative research and writing activities.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among authors and collaborators.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols and remote collaboration practices.","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms and collaboration tools.","People":"Authors, collaborators, and research team members.","Owner":"Authors, research team, and institutions."}]}
